name: Kinnikuman: Colosseum Deathmatch
overview: A one-on-one fighting game based on the "Kin-niku man" anime series starring heroic wrestlers and their ringside adventures. The game is played from a side-view with you controlling your Kin-niku Man (muscle-man) as he fights against three unique adversaries. Your arsenal consists of punches, kicks and unique throws that cause massive damage but can also damage you if they fail to connect.
